title: Flight 906 To Chicago
description: When unforeseen circumstances lead Henry and Charlie on what is supposed to be a routine favor to pick up Henryâ€™s younger brother Lewis, nothing goes as it should. Charlie and Henry end up in the mother of all traffic jams. They are both impatiently waiting and think an accident is being cleaned up. Little do they know the newest threat to America and soon the world, The Variants are on the loose, angry, hungry, and infecting. Check out Flight 906 and see what the bystanders of day one were forced to deal with and the insanity that entailed!
author: Mike        Evans
